.analog.description: Mutate the analog field of bevy_input::gamepad::Gamepad

.analog.axis_data.description: Mutate the axis_data component of analog (type: bevy_platform::collections::HashMap<bevy_input::gamepad::GamepadInput, f32, bevy_platform::hash::FixedHasher>)

.digital.description: Mutate the digital field of bevy_input::gamepad::Gamepad

.digital.just_pressed.description: Mutate the just_pressed component of digital (type: bevy_platform::collections::HashSet<bevy_input::gamepad::GamepadButton, bevy_platform::hash::FixedHasher>)

.digital.just_released.description: Mutate the just_released component of digital (type: bevy_platform::collections::HashSet<bevy_input::gamepad::GamepadButton, bevy_platform::hash::FixedHasher>)

.digital.pressed.description: Mutate the pressed component of digital (type: bevy_platform::collections::HashSet<bevy_input::gamepad::GamepadButton, bevy_platform::hash::FixedHasher>)

.product_id.description: Mutate the product_id field of bevy_input::gamepad::Gamepad
.product_id.note: For Option fields: pass the value directly to set Some, null to set None

.vendor_id.description: Mutate the vendor_id field of bevy_input::gamepad::Gamepad
.vendor_id.note: For Option fields: pass the value directly to set Some, null to set None
